snippet: Pregnancy centers, largely run by conservative Christians, say they are taking a “compassionate approach” to efforts to restrict abortion.
abstract: Pregnancy centers, pro-life organizations that provide services like testing, ultrasounds and parenting classes, are playing an increasingly influential role in the anti-abortion movement; centers are largely run by conservative Christians, and have already become more numerous nationwide than abortion providers.
lead_paragraph: Pregnancy centers, largely run by conservative Christians, say they are taking a “compassionate approach” to efforts to restrict abortion.

headline.seo: Pregnancy Centers Gain Influence in Anti-Abortion Fight
headline.main: Pregnancy Centers Gain Influence in Anti-Abortion Arena
headline.print_headline: Abortion Fight: Helping Hands Gain Influence
